cvrfdoc.DocumentTitle: FortiWeb - OS command injection due to unsafe input validation function

DocumentPublisher.ContactDetails: Fortinet PSIRT Contact: Email: vulnwatch@fortinet.com Website: fortiguard.com/psirt-pgpkey

DocumentNotes.Note: An improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS command vulnerability ('OS Command Injection') [CWE-78] in FortiWeb may allow authenticated users to execute unauthorized code or commands via crafted HTTP GET requests to WAD configuration handlers.
FortiWeb version 6.4.1 and below FortiWeb version 6.3.15 and belowFortiWeb version 6.2.6 and below
Upgrade to the upcoming FortiWeb version 7.0.0 or aboveUpgrade to FortiWeb version 6.4.2 or aboveUpgrade to FortiWeb version 6.3.16 or aboveUpgrade to FortiWeb version 6.2.7 or above
Internally discovered and reported by Mattia Fecit of the Fortinet Product Security team
